articles.title: The 55 best Amazon October Prime Day UK deals of 2025 according to our experts - including top offers on Apple, Shark and Amazon devices
articles.author: EMILY SCRIVENER
articles.summary: Amazon Prime Big Deal Days features discounts on various products.  Highlights include the Amazon Fire TV Stick 4K, Shark Stratos Vacuum Cleaner, Ring Battery Video Doorbell (2024 release), and Ninja CREAMi Ice Cream Maker, along with deals on Oral-B toothbrushes, Apple iPads, and Samsung tablets.  Deals extend to household essentials and beauty products, such as Ariel laundry capsules, Garnier Vitamin C Daily UV Brightening Fluid, and Breville Barista Max Espresso Machine.

articles.title: Rare £100 saving on Dyson airwrap in the Amazon Prime Day 2025 sale
articles.author: Daisy Lester
articles.summary: Dyson launched the Airwrap i.d. multistyler, an upgraded version of its popular Airwrap, featuring app connectivity for personalized styling routines based on hair type and skill level. The new version includes attachments such as a conical barrel, wave+curl diffuser, and blade concentrator. Amazon's Prime Big Deal Days offers a rare £100 discount on the new Dyson Airwrap i.d.

articles.title: Eufy's robot vacuum has huge £200 off in the Amazon Prime Day sale
articles.author: Steve Hogarty
articles.summary: Amazon has significantly reduced the price of the Eufy X10 Pro Omni robot vacuum cleaner to £529 during the Prime Big Deal Days sale, down from its usual retail price of £729. This robot vacuum offers hands-off cleaning with powerful suction, dual spinning mop pads, and a self-cleaning docking station that empties the dustbin, washes and dries the mop pads, and refills the water tank.

articles.title: Amazon Launches Budget Grocery Brand To Compete With Walmart From Harlem to Harare
articles.author: Harlem World Magazine
articles.summary: Amazon has launched "Amazon Grocery," a new private-label grocery brand aimed at budget-conscious consumers. This brand consolidates Amazon Fresh and Happy Belly, offering over 1,000 items, primarily priced under $5. The products are available online through Amazon.com and at physical Amazon Fresh stores.

articles.title: Arby's Releases 'First-of-Its-Kind' Product
articles.author: Rob Quinn
articles.summary: Arby's has launched steak nuggets nationwide, describing them as a "first-of-its-kind" premium protein product.  The steak nuggets, available for a limited time, can be ordered in servings of five or nine pieces with Hickory BBQ sauce, in sandwiches, or on top of mac-and-cheese in the "Steak Nugget Bowl."

articles.title: Splendor Labs Launches Splendor Search and API, Defining the Future of the AI Internet
articles.author: Ein News
articles.summary: Splendor Labs has launched Splendor Search and Splendor Search API, designed to power SplendNet, an AI-driven internet. Splendor Search offers users a way to discover information online with advanced reasoning, while the API allows developers to integrate real-time AI reasoning into their applications. Both products are currently live and accessible.

articles.title: OpenAI unveils ChatGPT app integration feature
articles.author: CTV
articles.summary: OpenAI launched a new feature for ChatGPT.

articles.title: Is The Giant OpenAI-AMD Deal Another Sign of an AI Bubble?
articles.author: Cortney Harding
articles.summary: Friend, an AI wearable allowing conversations with a large language model, has launched but faces brutal early reviews. OpenAI has partnered with Shopify to enable merchants to sell directly within the Shopify platform. AMD and OpenAI formed a multi billion dollar partnership.

articles.title: OpenAI unveils ChatGPT app integration feature
articles.author: AFP
articles.summary: OpenAI launched Apps SDK, a new feature for ChatGPT, enabling it to interact with apps like Spotify and Booking.com. This allows users to directly engage with services such as music selection, real estate searches, and hotel/flight bookings within the ChatGPT interface. Initial partners include Booking.com, Canva, Coursera, Figma, Expedia, Spotify, and Zillow.

articles.title: Elon Musk Gambles on Sexy A.I. Companions
articles.author: Kate Conger
articles.summary: Elon Musk's xAI launched two sexually explicit chatbot companions, Ani and Valentine, as part of the Grok app. These AI personas resemble anime characters and offer a gamelike function where users unlock more raunchy content as they progress through conversation levels. The chatbots are available to users who confirm they are over 18 and are designed to engage in sexually explicit interactions.

articles.title: I use this free app store to access my favorite apps from USB and Google Drive on any PC
articles.author: Tashreef Shareef
articles.summary: PortableApps.com offers a free app store and launcher platform designed to run portable apps from a USB drive or cloud storage.  Users can download the platform installer, select a destination, and then install and manage various portable apps from a central menu. The platform helps save storage space and allows users to access their tools from any PC.

articles.title: Neon at the Opera: There's a New AI Web Browser in Town
articles.summary: Opera launched Neon, a new AI-centric browser. This browser allows users to ask questions and make demands at any time with any tab open. It can reference open tabs to complete tasks across multiple websites.

articles.title: Vidwud AI: Smart Tools for Creative Editing
articles.author: Oki Bin Oki
articles.summary: Vidwud AI introduces an online platform offering AI-powered editing tools, including AI Head Swap and AI Clothes Changer. The AI Head Swap feature allows users to replace heads in photos, while the AI Clothes Changer enables changing outfits without a new picture, catering to fashion, product presentations, and personal projects.

articles.title: The best place to shop the Ninja Slushi maker on sale isn't at Amazon
articles.author: ZDNet
articles.summary: Ninja is offering deals on the Ninja Slushi maker, although the best deals aren't part of Prime Day sales.

articles.title: OpenAI DevDay event live updates: Agent Kit, Apps SDK, ChatGPT, and more
articles.author: ZDNet
articles.summary: The company has announced the launch of a new Agentic Builder and has released updates for ChatGPT.

articles.title: The 13 Best Tech Deals You Can Find Outside of Amazon Prime Day
articles.author: Bryn Gelbart
articles.summary: Walmart is offering deals on tech products, including MacBooks, PCs, DualSense PS5 controllers, and Samsung's Odyssey G5 gaming monitor, as an alternative to Amazon's Prime Day deals. These deals aim to attract customers looking for tech products at competitive prices.

articles.title: Nerds Just Released an Even Better Version of My All-Time Favorite Candy
articles.author: Bailey Fink
articles.summary: Nerds has launched new Juicy Gummy Clusters, twice the size of the original Gummy Clusters and filled with a juicy center. These new candies won the 2025 Most Innovative New Product Award and are available at select retailers now, with wider availability coming soon. Alongside this launch, returning Berry Punch Rush and new Cherry Lemonade Blitz Nerds Gummy Clusters flavors will also be available for a limited time.

articles.title: The McDonald's McGriddle We Will Be Ordering For Breakfast Every Time
articles.author: Julia Mullaney
articles.summary: In 2003, McDonald's introduced the McGriddle, a breakfast sandwich with pancakes for buns. The McGriddle comes in three versions: Sausage, Sausage, Egg, and Cheese; and Bacon, Egg, and Cheese.

articles.title: 51 Early October Prime Day Deals Actually Worth Adding to Your Cart
articles.summary: Amazon is offering special promotions during its October Prime Day, including discounts on products from brands like Oral-B, CeraVe, Neutrogena, and Brita. Prime members can also access benefits such as a free Grubhub+ membership and early access to 'Wicked: For Good,' as well as discounts at Amazon Fresh and an Amazon gift card upon approval.

articles.title: Accident at Neuenkirchen-Vörden and Holdorf
articles.summary: Neue Osnabrücker Zeitung (NOZ) is launching a promotional campaign to drive digital subscriptions, offering a trial month of full digital access for 99 cents. They also promote an annual subscription with a 30% discount at €9.95 per month. This push is aimed at building a loyal audience and improving search engine rankings.

articles.title: Roborock's Ready for Prime Time With Savings of Up to 45% Off Their Award-Winning Robot Vacuums
articles.author: Gizmodo
articles.summary: Amazon's Fall Prime Day features deals on Roborock's AI-powered cleaning machines.

articles.title: 40 TikTok Products That Are Worth The Hype And *Already* On Sale For Fall Prime Day
articles.author: Emma Lord
articles.summary: Several companies are introducing or offering discounts on various products and services. Yankee Candle offers discounts on newly designed jar candles, while Dyson offers discounts on V11 vacuum cleaner. Beats offers discounts on Studio Buds.

articles.title: Arby's takes aim at chicken nugget crowd with steak
articles.author: Kelly Tyko
articles.summary: Arby's has launched Steak Nuggets, hand-cut, bite-sized pieces of steak, available nationwide for a limited time. The nuggets are available in 5- or 9-count options, as well as a Steak Nugget Sandwich and a Steak Nugget Bowl over white cheddar mac and cheese. This product aims to provide a convenient, portable protein option for on-the-go eaters.

articles.title: George F. Young Acquired by Nashville-Based Company as a Content Writer, Not a Virtual Assistant
articles.author: Omar El Sayed
articles.summary: Nashville-based firms increasingly value specialized content creation. For example, BrightSpark Digital, experienced a 30% increase in organic traffic after hiring a dedicated content writer focused on creating informative blog posts and patient education materials. This shift highlights the strategic importance of content writers in driving growth, enhancing brand authority, and improving SEO performance.

articles.title: Arby's rolls out Steak Nuggets nationwide — but only for a limited time
articles.author: Danielle Abreu
articles.summary: Arby's has launched a new product called Steak Nuggets, which are described as tender, juicy, hand-cut bite-sized pieces of steak seasoned with garlic and pepper. The Steak Nuggets are available as an entrée, in a sandwich, or in a bowl. Arby's customers nationwide can try them for a limited time.

articles.title: OpenAI now lets you chat with third-party apps within ChatGPT
articles.summary: OpenAI has launched a new feature allowing users to interact with third-party apps directly within ChatGPT. This functionality is powered by OpenAI's new SDK, which enables developers to build and integrate their applications into the ChatGPT environment. The first batch of apps available includes Booking.com, Canva, Coursera, Expedia, Figma, Spotify, and Zillow, with plans to add more such as DoorDash, OpenTable, Target, and Uber.

articles.title: Arby's Steak Nuggets Are Here: Check Availability And What's On the Menu Before They're Gone
articles.summary: Arby's has launched a new product called Steak Nuggets, available nationwide from October 6 for a limited time. The Steak Nuggets are made with tender, hand-cut pieces of steak and are available in three different menu formats: as an entree with Hickory BBQ sauce, in a sandwich with havarti cheese and other toppings, or in a bowl with white cheddar mac and cheese.

articles.title: Prime members can get Amazon's nugget ice maker for $199
articles.author: Josie Howell
articles.summary: Amazon is offering the Crzoe countertop nugget ice maker, a new product designed for home use. The machine produces up to 35 pounds of nugget ice daily and features a self-cleaning function. Prime members can purchase it for $199 with free delivery.

articles.title: OpenAI will let developers build apps that work inside ChatGPT
articles.author: Jay Peters
articles.summary: OpenAI is launching a new service that integrates apps directly into ChatGPT, enabling users to complete tasks using those apps within the chatbot's interface. Initially, services like Canva, Zillow, Booking.com, Coursera, Expedia, Figma, and Spotify are available, with plans to add DoorDash, OpenTable, Target, and Uber in the near future. Developers can access the SDK to create apps for ChatGPT, and a directory will be provided for users to browse available integrations.

articles.title: Where Culture Meets Clean: Tide Laundromat Opens in the Heart of Oak Cliff
articles.author: Ein News
articles.summary: Tide Services, a subsidiary of Procter & Gamble, has launched a new Tide Laundromat in Oak Cliff, Dallas, offering self-service and full-service Wash & Fold options, including select Tide Cleaners services. The laundromat features smart machines, app-based payments, free Wi-Fi, and charging stations, providing a faster and cleaner laundry experience.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy M17 5G to launch on October 10 in India, Know details here
articles.author: Pratyay
articles.summary: Samsung is launching the Samsung Galaxy M17 5G smartphone in India on October 10. The phone features a 6.7-inch Super AMOLED display, a 50MP primary rear camera, and IP54 water and dust resistance. It will be available on Amazon India and comes with features like Circle to Search and Gemini Live.

articles.title: India launches UPI payment system in Qatari supermarket
articles.author: Business Line
articles.summary: Commerce and Industry Minister Piyush Goyal launched UPI.

articles.title: Karcher RCV 5 robot vacuum review: This robot has the features of a model twice its price - it stunned me in performance tests
articles.author: DANIELLE AMATO
articles.summary: Karcher has released the RCV 5, a robot vacuum featuring LiDAR navigation, a camera, wet mopping, and object detection. The RCV 5 can map multiple rooms, set cleaning schedules, and define no-go zones via the Karcher robot vacuum app. It offers smart features at a price lower than premium models from competitors like Eufy, Samsung, and Dyson.

articles.title: Save up to 50% on Dyson stick vacuums, fans, heaters and more for October Prime Day
articles.author: Rikka Altland
articles.summary: Dyson is offering discounts up to 50% on various home appliances during October Prime Day. The sale includes cordless stick vacuums like the V11 Origin and V15 Detect Absolute, robot vacuums like the 360 Vis Nav, upright vacuums like the Ball Animal Total Clean, and combination wet and dry vacuums like the V15s Detect Submarine Absolute. Also discounted are air purifiers and fan combos, including the Purifier Hot+Cool Gen1 HP10, Hot+Cool AM09 Jet Focus, Purifier Hot+Cool HP1, Purifier Cool TP07, and Purifier Cool PC1.

articles.title: Personify Launches A2Z Event Sales Engine to Transform How Event Professionals Drive Revenue and Engage Exhibitors
articles.author: Personify Corp
articles.summary: Personify launched the A2Z Event Sales Engine on October 6, 2025. This all-in-one solution helps event organizers simplify sales, maximize sponsorship opportunities, and create a seamless exhibitor and sponsor experience. The tool also provides flexible control over pricing and helps increase revenue.

articles.title: Dart Launches AI Chat and AI Agents to Elevate Project Management Intelligence to the Next Level
articles.author: Getnews
articles.summary: Dart has introduced its new AI Chat and AI Agents features, transforming project management with intelligent automation. This new functionality allows users to chat, trigger actions, and delegate tasks to both Dart's PM agent and third-party agents. The platform integrates with tools like ChatGPT, Slack, and GitHub.

articles.title: Ninja sale beats early Amazon Prime Day deal with �120 discount on best-selling air fryer
articles.author: The Mirror
articles.summary: Ninja is offering a significant discount of 120 on its best-selling Ninja Air Fryer, surpassing Amazon's Prime Day deal. This promotion provides an opportunity to purchase the popular kitchen appliance at a reduced price.

articles.title: I Don't Know What Kind Of Magic Created These 31 Game-Changing Products, But They're So Cool That I'm Not Going To Ask
articles.author: Emma Lord
articles.summary: Gold Bond launched a firming neck and chest cream with aloe, salicylic acid, and jojoba oil. Sally Hansen introduced Insta-Dri nail polish for quick touch-ups. Catrice released an "Instant Awake" Under Eye Brightener in four shades. Color Wow launched "Raise The Root" thickening and lifting spray. E.l.f. released Lash Xtndr Tubing Mascara. The Pink Stuff launched new "Sqeezy" sponge set.

articles.title: Powering the agentic enterprise: New innovations in IBM webMethods Hybrid Integration (IBM - International Business Machines Corporation)
articles.author: Public Technologies
articles.summary: IBM introduces new innovations in its webMethods Hybrid Integration platform. This aims to help enterprises accelerate innovation and demonstrate tangible returns on AI investments.

articles.title: How Elon Musk Is Bringing Sexy A.I. Chatbots to the Mainstream
articles.author: Kate Conger
articles.summary: Elon Musk's xAI unveiled two new sexually explicit chatbot companions named Ani. These cartoonish personas resemble anime characters and offer a gamelike function with raunchy content unlocked through conversation.

articles.title: We've Tested Nearly 100 Nonstick Cookware Sets. These 4 Are Actually Worth Your Money.
articles.author: Nicole Papantoniou
org: Good Housekeeping Institute Kitchen Appliances and Innovation Lab
articles.summary: Circulon's A1 Series 9-Piece Cookware Set features durable, ridged cooking surfaces and cool-touch handles. T-fal's 12-Piece Signature Nonstick Cookware Set offers affordable, lightweight pans with a thermo-heat indicator. GreenPan's Valencia Pro 11-Piece Nonstick Cookware Set uses a ceramic coating free from harmful materials and is induction-compatible, while Ninja's Foodi NeverStick Premium Hard-Anodized 8-Piece Cookware Set is durable and scratch-resistant, expanding Ninja's product line beyond air fryers.

articles.title: Clicksfinity Unveils Global Platform Giving Users Access to Digital Advertising Campaigns Worldwide
articles.summary: Clicksfinity, a London-based technology company, has launched its global platform enabling users to sponsor digital advertising campaigns and participate in their results. The platform offers features like global accessibility, a variety of campaigns, transparency, and flexible sponsorship options, utilizing AI-driven tools to enhance campaign efficiency. Users can contribute to campaigns and receive a share of the results proportional to their contribution and participation.

articles.title: Un sac moule, un accordéon, un talon invisible… Les accessoires les plus fous de la Fashion Week de Paris
articles.author: Adèle Bari
articles.summary: An apparel company is introducing a new line of high-end baby clothes. They are partnering with an agency to create profiles of wealthy young parents for targeted advertising within partner apps. The goal is to promote the new line to the most relevant consumer base.

articles.title: Arby's Debuts Steak Nuggets for a Limited-Time
articles.author: Michael Carpenter
articles.summary: Arby's has launched a new product called Steak Nuggets, which are tender, juicy, hand-cut bite-sized pieces of steak seasoned with garlic and pepper. Steak Nuggets are available in three forms: a 5 or 9-count entrée, a sandwich with Havarti cheese and crispy onions, and a bowl featuring the nuggets on top of Mac 'n Cheese. They are currently available at Arby's restaurants nationwide for a limited time.

articles.title: Arby's Debuts Steak Nuggets for a Limited-Time
articles.author: Michael Carpenter
articles.summary: Arby's has launched a new product called Steak Nuggets, which are tender, juicy, hand-cut pieces of steak seasoned with garlic and pepper. The Steak Nuggets are seared and smoked for convenience and are available at Arby's restaurants nationwide for a limited time.

articles.title: Breakout Launches 'Breakout Blocks' to Turn Static Websites Into AI-powered Buyer Journeys
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Breakout, a startup developing an AI Inbound SDR, launched 'Blocks', a new product line. This product is designed to transform static website elements into AI-powered interfaces, enabling real-time personalization of user experiences. Blocks aim to convert website visitors into pipeline.

articles.title: M&M introduces new versions of Bolero starting ₹ 7.99 lakh
articles.author: The Hindu Bureau
articles.summary: Mahindra & Mahindra Ltd. has launched the new Bolero range, with prices starting at ₹7.99 lakh, including a new top-end B8 variant at ₹9.69 lakh. The new Bolero Neo starts at ₹8.49 lakh, with a new top-end N11 variant priced at ₹9.99 lakh. This is the seventh upgrade to the Bolero since its initial launch 25 years ago.

articles.title: The Genie® Company Unveils New Industrial Design Garage Door Opener for Residential Applications
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Genie, a garage door opener innovator, has released the G3120HL, a newly designed opener. The G3120HL offers advanced features, durable performance, and exceptional value.

articles.title: Wingstop ‘excited' to open its doors at Rushden Lakes today
articles.author: William Carter
articles.summary: Wingstop has launched a new restaurant in Rushden Lakes, Northamptonshire. The opening included free chicken wings for the first 100 customers and is part of Wingstop's growth strategy within the UK, aiming for 200 sites in the next five years. The new location offers a full menu of wings, tenders, burgers, and more.

articles.title: With Surging Sales and Rave Reviews, JustHang Squeegee Unveils New Color Collection
articles.author: Pr Newswire
articles.summary: Dancemoon, a home cleaning innovation company, launched a new collection of vibrant colors for its JustHang Squeegee, building on the product's initial success. To promote the new colors, dancemoon will offer a 36% discount on the JustHang Squeegee during Prime Big Deal Days (Oct 7-8).

articles.title: Céline Dion aperçue en famille au concert de Paul McCartney
articles.author: Blanche Marcel
articles.summary: An apparel company is promoting its new line of high-end baby clothes. The company intends to target wealthy young parents or couples with new children through advertising within partner apps. This targeting utilizes customer profiles created by an agency with a network of high-income clients.

articles.title: SwitchBot Introduces Safety Alarm, a Compact Device for Personal Security
articles.summary: SwitchBot has launched the SwitchBot Safety Alarm, a compact personal security device combining deterrence, notifications, and location tracking. The device, priced at USD 39.99, emits a 130dB siren and strobe light when activated and can send real-time alerts to family members via the SwitchBot app.

articles.title: Give the dryer a day off with Sports Direct's ‘low-energy' gadget slashed by £40
articles.author: Roisin Chapman
articles.summary: Sports Direct is offering the Daewoo Electricals Winged Airer for £25, reduced from £64.99. The heated airer is designed with fold-out wings for extra drying space and low energy consumption and can hold up to 15kg of washing.

articles.title: New tech tackles multi-billion problem of fake whisky and spirits
articles.author: The Scotsman
articles.summary: Global luxury drinks experts are developing a new platform. This platform provides full traceability, transparency, and compliance across the product lifecycle of Scotch whisky and other spirits.

articles.title: How to turn off the new 'Find Similar' feature that pops up automatically when pausing on TikTok
articles.author: Ljeonida Mulabazi
articles.summary: TikTok introduced a new feature called 'visual search tagging' that utilizes AI to scan videos, detect objects, and suggest similar posts or products to users.  The feature is rolling out to select creators, and users can disable it in their settings. The new feature can identify clothes or products and link to similar things on TikTok Shop.

articles.title: LG Pra.L Debuts Next-Gen Skincare Tech with SUPERFORM Galvanic Booster
articles.author: LG Pra. L
articles.summary: LG Household & Health Care's beauty-tech division, LG Pra.L, has launched the LG Pra.L SUPERFORM Galvanic Booster in the US. This device uses galvanic technology to enhance skincare product absorption, reportedly by up to 182%.

articles.title: Night Lark Coverless Duvet review: I won't use a traditional duvet again after trying this
articles.author: Ellis Cochrane
articles.summary: Night Lark introduces a coverless duvet, noted for its convenience and design. The duvet is made from recycled materials, machine washable, and available in different tog ratings for various seasons. It is praised for its softness, ease of care, and suitability for various uses, including guest rooms and university students.

articles.title: Albania's Balfin to focus on brands with cross-border growth potential
articles.author: Genta Hodo
articles.summary: Mane plans to introduce new brands in the region. SeeNext launched a new Digitalisation study and index which is available for download.

articles.title: Off Stamp Vape Flavors By Durity Distribution
articles.author: Romania Journal
articles.summary: Durity Distribution has launched various off stamp vape flavors including Juicy Peach, Sour Lush Gummy, Watermelon Ice, Miami Mint, Dragon Strawnana, California Cherry, Blue Razz Ice, and Cherry Strazz. These flavors cater to a wide range of customer preferences, from fruity to refreshing and exotic blends, offering retailers a diverse selection to attract new customers and boost sales.

articles.title: Innovative Eyewear Reports Strong International Expansion at SILMO Paris 2025, Securing Key European Distribution Partners
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Innovative Eyewear, Inc. showcased their products at SILMO's Smart Eyewear Tech Village. The company also announced a new distribution hub in the Netherlands to expand VAT-free EU business.

articles.title: City Square Mart Broadens Horizon in Gujarat with Latest Store Launch
articles.author: Devdiscourse News Desk
articles.summary: City Square Mart opened a new 9,500 sq. ft. retail outlet in Mansa, Gujarat, offering over 20,000 products. Jay Ambe Supermarkets, operating the stores under the City Square Mart brand, aims to provide a diverse range of products. The company now has 17 stores across Gujarat.

articles.title: Canon expands large format graphics production portfolio with new 3.4m Colorado XL-series roll-to-roll and hybrid ...
articles.author: APO
articles.summary: Canon introduces the Colorado XL-series, a new 3.4m printer platform utilizing UVgel technology for the 3.2m graphics market. This modular, field-upgradable platform is available in hybrid and roll-to-roll configurations.

articles.title: 33 Amazon Cleaning Items Our Readers Are Loving In 2025
articles.author: Griffin Gonzales
articles.summary: Several new cleaning products have been introduced. These include a scrubbing bubbles cleaning stamp, The Pink Stuff cleaning paste and floor cleaner, and Wet & Forget Shower Cleaner. Also featured are Bioclean hard water stain remover, Affresh washing machine cleaners, and a portable Bissell Little Green upholstery cleaner.

articles.title: China's Kuaishou lures overseas users with ‘NSFW' AI companions
articles.author: Vincent Chow
articles.summary: Kuaishou Technology launched its AI companion service, FantaSay, through its Singapore unit, Symphony Tech, last month. The service offers an 'ultimate immersive chat experience' with AI companions and has garnered as many as 500,000 downloads. Several other Chinese start-ups including MiniMax, PolyBuzz and HiWaifu have also launched AI companion apps targeting overseas users.

articles.title: American Express Unveils Amex Ads to Connect U.S. Card Members to Premium Brands
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: American Express launched Amex Ads, a new digital advertising platform designed to connect brands with its 34 million U.S. Consumer Card Members. The platform, building on the success of Amex Offers, allows brands to serve relevant, contextual ads on Amex-owned platforms like AmexTravel.com. Early campaigns with Marriott Bonvoy and TUMI demonstrated successful results, highlighting the platform's ability to reach targeted Card Members and drive sales.

articles.title: Duolingo is introducing its own mobile ads platform.
articles.author: Jay Peters
articles.summary: Duolingo is launching its mobile ads platform. The company states that these ads will be playful and incorporate Duolingo's characters. Adobe, Intrepid Travel, and Universal Pictures are among the first companies to utilize the platform.

articles.title: Yellow Pages Launches $10,000 Digital Marketing Transformation Contest in Honour of Small Business Month Français
articles.author: Yellow Pages Limited
articles.summary: Yellow Pages Limited launched "The Digital Marketing Transformation Contest" to support Canadian small businesses during Small Business Month. The contest winner will receive a prize package valued at $10,000, which includes expert marketing support, digital tools such as Search Engine Marketing (SEM), a tool to manage Visibility, Reputation, and Social Media Management, Priority Placement on YP.ca, and a Pro Website powered by Wix, and paid advertising.

articles.title: Jeff Bezos et Lauren Sánchez jouent l'harmonie vestimentaire lors de la Fashion Week
articles.author: Vanity Fair
articles.summary: An apparel company is promoting its new line of high-end baby clothes. The company is working with an agency to create profiles of wealthy young parents to target them with advertising within partner apps.

articles.title: ‘Lazy girl hygiene hack' goes viral on TikTok and we can't believe we haven't tried this before
articles.author: Kat O'Connor
articles.summary: Influencer Bambi Does Beauty recommends a new application method for The Ordinary Glycolic Acid using a spray cap for easier use on underarms and feet. This hygiene hack aims to simplify skincare routines and enhance product effectiveness. The Ordinary Glycolic Acid helps to remove dead skin cells and reduce build-up which makes the skin look brighter, healthier, and smoother.

articles.title: Veylan Debuts First End-to-End AI-Native Advertising Platform, Named Category Leader by WARC
articles.author: Joplin Globe
articles.summary: Veylan has announced new product features for its AI-native operating system for advertising. This system unifies strategy, creative, media buying, and optimization into one platform, enabling advertisers and marketers to plan, execute, and optimize campaigns more efficiently.

articles.title: 2025 Mahindra Bolero, Bolero Neo launched in India: Know engine, features and prices
articles.author: Pratyay
articles.summary: Mahindra and Mahindra has launched the 2025 versions of the Bolero and Bolero Neo SUVs in India. The 2025 Mahindra Bolero starts at Rs 7.99 lakh, and the 2025 Mahindra Bolero Neo starts at Rs 8.49 lakh, featuring cosmetic and feature updates like new grilles, alloy wheels, touchscreen infotainment, and new color options.

articles.title: AI Photo Editor Photowand Launches Globally, Replacing $5,000 Photography Sessions with $9.99/Month Service Processing 500,000 Photos Daily
articles.author: Getnews
articles.summary: Circo, Inc. launched Photowand AI on October 6, 2025, an AI platform for generating professional-quality images from basic reference photos. The service, priced at $9.99 per month, operates in over 180 countries and provides an alternative to traditional photography for businesses, offering features like natural language editing and pre-configured photo templates.

articles.title: A New iPad Mini Is Coming, But Apple May Have Trouble Justifying It
articles.author: BGR
articles.summary: Apple is potentially launching a new version of the iPad mini. This development targets small tablet enthusiasts.

articles.title: 35 Lifehack Products To Make You Feel Like A Genius
articles.author: Rachelle Yang
articles.summary: The content highlights the introduction of various innovative products designed to solve everyday problems and enhance convenience. These include items like a hands-free phone mount, a foaming garbage disposal cleaner, an eyelash comb, color-catching sheets for laundry, a car bag holder, a pet hair remover, and a baseboard cleaner, among others, all aiming to simplify tasks and improve user experiences.

articles.title: Al-Futtaim BYD KSA unveils the SHARK 6: Saudi Arabia's first-ever plug-in hybrid pickup
articles.author: Saudi Gazette
articles.summary: Al-Futtaim BYD KSA, the official distributor of BYD, has launched the BYD SHARK 6 in Saudi Arabia. The BYD SHARK 6 is Saudi Arabia's first-ever model of its kind.

articles.title: 44 Things That'll Help You Realize The Handyman Has Been Living In Your House All Along (Psst, It's *You*)
articles.author: Elizabeth Lilly
articles.summary: The article introduces a variety of new home improvement and cleaning products. These include NoNo Brackets, which allow curtain rod installation without drilling; dishwasher-cleaning tablets for residue removal; stain-lifting pads for pet stains; a jetted tub cleaner and SnapPower GuideLight to optimize outlets; perma-mulch made of recycled tires, and magnetic garage handles to enhance curb appeal.

articles.title: AI-Powered Brand Guidelines Go Dynamic - Branding Insights from Digital Silk Branding Agency
articles.author: Newsfile
articles.summary: Digital Silk has released insights on how artificial intelligence is transforming brand guidelines, moving from static PDFs to dynamic, AI-powered systems. These systems update in real-time, allowing businesses to automatically adapt brand elements while maintaining consistency. According to Digital Silk's CEO, this evolution results in real-time, adaptive branding solutions.

articles.title: Tesla to unveil lower-cost Model Y to revive sales momentum
articles.author: Saskia Koopman
articles.summary: Tesla is expected to unveil a lower-cost version of its Model Y SUV, named the Model Y Standard, this week. This new variant features simplified styling, a smaller battery and fewer premium features to bring down costs, with prices expected to begin around $39,990 in the US.

articles.title: Devyani Rana Launches ‘Gau Shakti' Organic Floor Cleaner to Empower Women in Nagrota
articles.author: Kns Desk Srinagar
articles.summary: Bharatiya Janata Yuva Morcha's Vice President, Devyani Rana, launched 'Gau Shakti Floor Cleaner,' an eco-friendly, organic cleaning product made by women from the Nagrota constituency. This product, developed from natural cow-based ingredients, aims to promote self-reliant rural industries. Furthermore, 'Pooja Sathi' Dhoop Cones, another product by Nagrota's women, is available on e-commerce platforms like Amazon.

articles.title: Why Aldi Fans Are Excited About Barnegat's New Store
articles.author: Eddie Davis
articles.summary: Aldi is expanding its grocery store services by opening a new Aldi Food Market in Ocean County at 10 Barnegat Blvd. The new store will be the third Aldi location in Ocean County and will offer Aldi's signature features, including mostly own-brand products, healthier food options, and a unique shopping experience.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy M17 5G to launch in India on October 10: Hereâs what the smartphone may offer
articles.author: TOI Tech Desk
articles.summary: Samsung is launching the Galaxy M17 5G in India on October 10. The device features a 50MP triple-camera system, Corning Gorilla Glass Victus, an IP54 rating, a 6.7-inch Super AMOLED display, and AI features like Circle to Search with Google and Gemini Live. It will be available in Moonlight Silver and Sapphire Black.

articles.title: White Lotus-Seed Mooncakes, the Best Pens, and Other Recent Strategist Finds
articles.author: The Editors
articles.summary: The content highlights several products including a gum marketed for smokers, the Stratocaster guitar, a clay pomade, the Susteas cheese grater, mooncakes from Kee Wah Bakery, Taiwanese-style mooncakes, Shark watches, Cordaroys beanbag chair that converts into a bed, and Anterique smudge-free pen. These products are described based on user experiences and their features.

articles.title: Arby's Rolls Out A Delicious New Entree Option For A Limited Time
articles.author: Abigail Wilt
articles.summary: Arby's has launched a new product called Steak Nuggets nationwide for a limited time. These are described as tender, juicy, hand-cut, bite-sized morsels of steak seasoned with garlic and pepper. Customers can enjoy them as an entree, in a sandwich, or in a bowl.

articles.title: Harry's Launches First Ever Cologne Collection
articles.author: Harry's
articles.summary: Harry's, a men's grooming brand, is introducing its first-ever line of cologne, marking its entry into the fragrance category. The collection features three unique, long-lasting scents.

articles.title: Chucking a 69p essential in your washing machine will stop your clothes from smelling all musty
articles.author: Henna Sharma
articles.summary: smol recommends washing most loads at 20°C for 30 minutes using their detergent. They suggest this is gentler on fabrics, reduces energy use, and still delivers excellent stain removal. smol also explains the difference between bio and non-bio detergents and advises on washing machine maintenance to prevent odors.

articles.title: I tested a $400 Android phone with an E Ink like display, and it was ...
articles.author: ZDNet
articles.summary: TCL's Nxtpaper 60 Ultra prioritizes eye comfort and stylus performance. The TCL Nxtpaper 60 Ultra redefines the Ultra in smartphones.

articles.title: Canon expands large format graphics production portfolio with new 3.4m Colorado XL-series roll-to-roll and hybrid printer - powered by its unique UVgel technology
articles.author: Al Bawaba
articles.summary: Canon announces the Colorado XL-series, a new platform of 3.4m printers. The series extends the advantages of Canon's UVgel technology.

articles.title: Early Amazon Prime Big Deal Days offers on Ninja, Shark, Fire TV Sticks & more
articles.author: Emily Sleight
articles.summary: Amazon is holding Prime Big Deal Days where shoppers can find deals on various products. Current deals include the Amazon Fire TV Stick 4K, Shark SpeedStyle Hair Dryer, Amazon Fire Max 11 tablet, Shark Corded Upright Vacuum Cleaner, and the Ninja Blast Portable Blender. These products are available at discounted prices for a limited time.

articles.title: Zen Media Launches Prompt Discovery Index™, First AI-Native Replacement for Keyword Research
articles.summary: Zen Media has launched the Core 1,000 Prompt Universe™ and Prompt Discovery Index™, AI-driven systems generating up to 10,000 prompts to provide companies with measurable AI visibility and competitive advantage.  These systems aim to replace outdated keyword research with real-time AI visibility mapping, targeting CEOs, CMOs, PR leaders, and strategy teams.

articles.title: Oxo adds bone broths, ready-to-use stocks and stock powders
articles.author: Niamh Leonard-Bedwell
articles.summary: Oxo has launched new bone broths, ready-to-use stocks, and stock powders. The bone broths come in Beef and Chicken flavors, while the ready-to-use stocks are available in Succulent Chicken, Rich Beef, and Vegetable. The stock powders will be sold in Chicken & Herb, Garden Vegetable, and Mediterranean Vegetable flavors, with all products launching in Morrisons and Sainsbury's on October 13.

articles.title: ⚡Check Mahindra Bolero Neo Facelift Price, Specifications and Features
articles.summary: Mahindra Auto has launched the Bolero Neo facelift in India. The SUV features new dual-tone color options and a revamped front design. The starting price is INR 8.49 lakh.

articles.title: Arby's releasing new 'first-of-its-kind' steak nuggets nationwide
articles.author: Saman Shafiq
articles.summary: Arby's is launching a new product, Steak Nuggets, nationwide starting October 6th for a limited time. These nuggets are described as tender, juicy, hand-cut pieces of steak seasoned with garlic and pepper, offering a convenient way to enjoy steak on the go.

articles.title: Zen Media Launches Prompt Discovery Index™, First AI-Native Replacement for Keyword Research
articles.author: Zen Media
articles.summary: Zen Media launched its Prompt Discovery Index™, a product that uses the Core 1,000 Prompt Universe™ to generate prompts based on buyer intent, industry, and persona. This system aims to improve brand visibility by replacing keyword research with AI-driven mapping.

articles.title: Arby's Is Releasing a Jaw-Dropping New Menu Item—and We Tried It First
articles.author: Bailey Fink
articles.summary: Arby's has launched a new product called Steak Nuggets, available nationwide for a limited time. These steak nuggets are seasoned, seared, and smoked, and offered in three forms: as a plain entrée with BBQ sauce, as a sandwich with Havarti cheese and crispy onions, and as a bowl on top of Mac 'n Cheese with crispy onions.

articles.title: Arby's Steak Nuggets Review: Stick To The Sandwiches
articles.author: Michael Palan
articles.summary: Arby's has introduced Steak Nuggets, a new protein innovation, to its nationwide stores starting October 6th. The Steak Nuggets are available a la carte, in a sandwich with havarti cheese and crispy onions, or as part of a bowl with mac 'n cheese, offering customers various options to enjoy this limited-time offering.

articles.title: Arby's Just Made Steak More Snackable Than Ever
articles.author: Stephanie Gravalese
articles.summary: Arby's launched Steak Nuggets nationwide on October 6, offering a new steak-based alternative to chicken nuggets. The Steak Nuggets are available in three ways: as an entrée, in a sandwich, or atop white cheddar mac and cheese, providing a premium protein option.

articles.title: Andrew Yang Goes Off the Grid
articles.author: Charlotte Goddu
articles.summary: Andrew Yang launched Noble Mobile, a new phone plan designed to reimburse users for their leftover data. The launch was celebrated with an 'OFFLINE' party where attendees were encouraged to stow their phones. Blaise Serra is developing magic tricks for Noble Mobile, potentially turning phones into patches of grass.

articles.title: Victoria Beckham habille la mère de David Beckham avec ses créations
articles.author: Blanche Marcel
articles.summary: An apparel company is promoting its new line of high-end baby clothes. They are using targeted advertising by creating profiles of young, wealthy parents to present ads within partner apps.

articles.title: OnePlus 15 Launch Date In India, Price, Specs, Design, Color Options, Camera And More: All Details Here
articles.summary: OnePlus is planning to launch its next-generation flagship, the OnePlus 15, in China later this month, followed by a global debut on November 13 including the Indian market. The OnePlus 15 is expected to feature a 6.78-inch BOE X3 LTPO OLED display with a 165Hz refresh rate, Qualcomm's latest Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 chipset, up to 16GB LPDDR5x RAM, UFS 4.1 storage, a 7,300 mAh battery with 120W wired and 50W wireless charging, and OxygenOS 16. The phone could feature a 50-megapixel Sony LYT-700 primary camera and is expected to be priced between Rs 65,000 and Rs 75,000 in India.

articles.title: Galaxy M17 5G with 50MP OIS Triple Camera, Slim & Durable Body to Launch This Week
articles.summary: Samsung is launching the Galaxy M17 5G on October 10 in India. The phone features a 50MP OIS triple-camera system, Corning Gorilla Glass Victus protection, and a 6.7" Super AMOLED display. It also includes native AI powered by Circle to Search with Google and Gemini Live.

articles.title: iQOO Neo 11 launch details leaked: Check expected price and launch date, specs, features, display, battery & camera
articles.author: ET Online
articles.summary: iQOO is preparing to launch the iQOO Neo 11 smartphone in China, with an expected price of around 2,500 Yuan. The Neo 11 is expected to feature a 6.8-inch 2K OLED display, a 7,500 mAh battery with 100W fast charging, and iQOO's Monster Supercore Engine.

articles.title: Ooredoo Kuwait and Infobip bring New Era of Conversation Customer Experience powered by Agentic AI
articles.summary: Ooredoo Kuwait and Infobip have partnered to launch the Conversational Experience Orchestration Platform (CXOP) powered by Agentic AI in Kuwait. This collaboration aims to provide businesses with next-generation customer engagement solutions, leveraging AI, automation, and omnichannel communication across various channels. Ooredoo Kuwait is expanding its offerings to include a full suite of Software-as-a-Service (SaaS) and Communications Platform-as-a-Service (CPaaS) solutions.

articles.title: Gulfstream announces new G300 super-midsize jet. Check out the photos.
articles.author: Savannah Morning News
articles.summary: Gulfstream announced the new G300 during a customer event in Savannah. The event showcased each plane in the Gulfstream fleet.

articles.title: You've Probably Never Seen These 29 Hidden Gems On Amazon, But You'll Fall In Love With Them Immediately
articles.author: Celia Funderburk
articles.summary: Nyx launched the 'Smushy' Matte Lip Balm with a flexible applicator. Maybelline introduced the Lifter Glaze Oil Balm, a hydrating lip balm with a tint. Dr. Teal's released the 'Cozy Vanilla Season' Epsom salt magnesium soak with vanilla, spice, and vetiver essential oils. Londontown has introduced the Kur Instant Smudge Fix to fix nail polish smudges. Also, a weekly keyboard planner for deadlines, meetings, and goals is a newly launched product.

articles.title: I was excited to try Molly-Mae's new £330 hair collection as a busy toddler mum – but here's my main complaint
articles.author: Chloe Morgan
articles.summary: Beauty Works, in collaboration with Molly-Mae Hague, launched a new hair Curl Collection featuring the Beauty Works x Molly-Mae Curl Kit and the Beauty Works x Molly-Mae XXL Volume Hot Brush Kit. Reviews indicate the curling tong is effective for creating smooth, voluminous waves, while the hot brush is noted for adding volume and a sleek finish, although curls may not last as long.

articles.title: Canon expands large format graphics production portfolio with new 3.4m Colorado XL-series roll-to-roll and hybrid printer - powered by its unique UVgel technology
articles.summary: Canon has launched the Colorado XL-series, a new platform of 3.4m printers using UVgel technology. The series includes two models, Colorado XL7 roll-to-roll and Colorado XL7 hybrid, designed for versatile applications on flexible and rigid media. The new UVgel 860 ink set and UVgel 850 PrintHeads and UVgel FullBeam Curing are technology innovations of the Colorado XL-series

articles.title: New fashion, jewelry store and sandwich shop top our list of new North Jersey businesses
articles.author: Daniel Munoz
articles.summary: Rag & Bone had its grand opening on September 12 at the American Dream mall, offering New York and British-style clothing and accessories. Rocksbox, a designer jewelry store, opened on September 19 at Garden State Plaza mall with a range of rings, necklaces, earrings, and bracelets. Pressed Elite Sandwich Bar, serving Kosher sandwiches and other baked items, opened on September 30 in Englewood.

articles.title: Tsla new product reveal tomorrow
articles.summary: Tesla will reveal a new product tomorrow.

articles.title: Excella unveils the joy of gathering one meal at a time
articles.author: Partnered Content
articles.summary: Excella is teasing a new initiative designed to redefine how South Africans gather and share meals. While specific details are currently under wraps, the company states this initiative aims to enrich every meal and every home. Loyal customers are encouraged to stay tuned for the unveiling of these new delights.

articles.title: Musk launches Grok Imagine v0.9 to rival OpenAI's Sora 2
articles.summary: Elon Musk launched Grok Imagine v0.9, a major upgrade to his AI video generation platform. The new version promises faster and more realistic results with capabilities like instant text, image, and video generation. A voice-first interface is also introduced for a smoother user experience.

articles.title: OpenAI transforms ChatGPT into AI-powered shopping assistant with instant checkout
articles.summary: OpenAI's ChatGPT has introduced in-chat shopping for users in the US, allowing Plus, Pro, and Free users to instantly checkout within the chat interface. This feature, powered by the new Agentic Commerce Protocol (ACP) co-developed by Stripe, enables users to purchase products from Etsy sellers directly through ChatGPT.

articles.title: Unlock the Revolution in Smartphone Ownership: Ex-Flipkart Leader Jayant Jha Unveils BytePe, India's First Smartphone Subscription Service for the New Generation
articles.author: Daniel Foster
articles.summary: BytePe, founded by ex-Flipkart leader Jayant Jha, launched India's first smartphone subscription service in 2025. The service offers flexible ownership with monthly fees, upgrade options, and all-inclusive plans featuring insurance and warranty. BytePe aims to address affordability challenges in the Indian smartphone market, targeting young professionals, students, tech enthusiasts, and budget-conscious consumers.

articles.title: Yabble rolls out AI image-based testing for rapid concept feedback
articles.author: Best Media Info Bureau 06
articles.summary: Yabble, a YouGov company, has launched an AI image-based concept testing feature as part of its Virtual Audiences tool. This new functionality allows brands to upload static images and receive rapid feedback from AI personas, enabling faster creative validation and decision-making across applications like packaging design, new product ideas, and advertising campaigns.

articles.title: Nykaa projects mid-20% net revenue growth in Q2 due to early festive season
articles.summary: Nykaa is expanding its presence to the United Kingdom with the launch of its in-house brand, Kay Beauty. This expansion indicates a strategic move to introduce and market its product line in a new geographic region. The launch aims to leverage the brand's established presence and appeal to a broader customer base.

articles.title: Meta adds AI dubbing, persona ads and creator APIs to boost performance
articles.author: Best Media Info Bureau 06
articles.summary: Meta has introduced new generative AI features within Advantage+ creative, including AI-generated music, video HDR enhancement, and AI dubbing, to help advertisers personalize creative content. Additionally, Meta is enhancing creator collaboration features by expanding access to the Instagram Creator Marketplace API and introducing AI-recommended Collabs within the Partnership Ads Hub, allowing marketers to convert organic content into partnership ads.

articles.title: Simple way shoppers snag best Amazon Prime Big Deal Days deals for free
articles.author: Phoebe Barton
articles.summary: Amazon is hosting Prime Big Deal Days on October 7th and 8th, offering discounts on various products. Some of the products that are promoted in the event are: Amazon Fire HD 10 Tablet, Echo Dot Kids, Remington's Keratin Protect Intelligent Hair Straighteners and Shark SpeedStyle Hairdryer. Prime members will have exclusive access to bigger discounts.

articles.title: Samsung Moving Style battery-powered smart TV features portability and 27-inch QHD display
articles.summary: Samsung launched the Moving Style portable smart TV, featuring a 27-inch QHD display with a 120 Hz refresh rate, built-in battery, and wheeled stand. It is currently available in South Korea for approximately $1,000, with potential plans for global release.

articles.title: Bank Muscat organizes workshop on AI-driven marketing for its'Najahi' business banking customers - The Arabian Stories News
articles.summary: Bank Muscat organized an 'AI-Driven Marketing for Businesses' workshop for its 'Najahi' Business Banking customers. The workshop focused on leveraging AI for marketing strategies and campaigns. Bank Muscat launched the 'Najahi' Business Banking Unit in 2014 to provide tailored banking services and financial solutions to micro, small, and medium enterprises.

articles.title: 5 AI Platforms Redefining Discovery and Commerce
articles.author: Mansi Praharaj
articles.summary: Glance AI introduces a lock screen-based shopping experience, anticipating user preferences with AI. Doppl AI creates digital twins for accurate fit predictions, and YesPlz AI offers conversational shopping. Style DNA acts as a fashion coach, adapting to evolving styles. Daydream crafts mood boards for aspirational shopping.

articles.title: Zoho Unveils ‘Vani': A New Visual Collaboration Platform for Hybrid Teams After Arattai's Success
articles.author: Kahekashan
articles.summary: Zoho Corporation launched Vani, a next-generation visual collaboration platform, on October 1, 2025. Vani integrates whiteboards, AI-driven tools, and workflow automation, positioning itself as a contender against platforms like Google Workspace and Miro. The platform aims to bridge the communication gap by turning abstract thoughts into clear, shared visuals for more efficient teamwork.

articles.title: Mahindra Bolero Neo Facelift, Mahindra Bolero Facelift Launch Today India; Check Expected Key Specifications, Features and Price
articles.author: Team Latestly
articles.summary: Mahindra is launching facelift versions of its Bolero and Bolero Neo SUVs in India today. These models feature design upgrades, particularly in the front fascia, and continue to offer the 1.5-litre mHawk100 diesel engine. The Bolero Neo price is expected around INR 10–11 lakh, while the Bolero price could range from INR 10–13 lakh.

articles.title: Amazon's Prime Big Deal Days returns - here's the deals you can expect
articles.author: Emma North
articles.summary: Amazon is hosting Prime Big Deal Days on October 7 and 8, 2025, offering exclusive discounts to Prime members across various categories including tech, toys, fashion and homeware. Participating brands include Ninja, OURA, Dyson, Bosch and GHD. Amazon also offers a 30-day free trial for Prime membership, providing access to these deals and other benefits such as free shipping and streaming services.

articles.title: Virtual On unveils new approach to audience engagement through AR technology at live events
articles.author: Ein News
articles.summary: Virtual On is launching a new portable Augmented Reality (AR) solution that allows users to access immersive content through smartphones or large displays by scanning a QR code or visiting a link. This Interactive Augmented Reality Experience aims to enhance marketing campaigns, product launches, and corporate events, offering brands new ways to engage.

articles.title: IQOO Neo 11 Rumored to Feature Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 and 2K OLED Display
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: iQOO is preparing to launch its new smartphone, the iQOO Neo 11, in China, positioned as a more accessible alternative to the iQOO 15. The Neo 11 is expected to feature a 6.8-inch 2K OLED display, a Snapdragon 8 Elite processor, a 7,500 mAh battery with 100W fast charging, and IP68 certification, with an anticipated launch price of around 2,500 Yuan.

articles.title: Kate Middleton porte des boucles d'oreilles offertes par le prince William, avec une tenue inspirée par Diana
articles.author: Isaac Bickerstaff
articles.summary: An apparel company is promoting its new line of high-end baby clothes. The company is working with an agency to create profiles of wealthy young parents to target with advertising within partner apps. This involves identifying and reaching potential customers for the new product line.

articles.title: Nokia 800 Tough (2nd Gen) in the Works After Six Years; Likely to Feature USB-C and KaiOS 3.1
articles.author: Bhupendra Singh Chundawat
articles.summary: HMD Global is planning to launch the Nokia 800 Tough (2nd Gen), a refresh of the original rugged feature phone. The new version retains the original design but includes upgrades such as a USB-C port and KaiOS 3.1 software, catering to users seeking a durable keypad phone for outdoor or industrial use. The phone is expected to have features like a 2.4-inch display, 2MP rear camera, and a 2,100mAh battery.

articles.title: Nykaa shares jump 2% on strong Q2 business update. Check details
articles.summary: Nykaa reported a strong Q2 performance, with consolidated net revenue expected to grow in the mid-20% range YoY, driven by an early festive season. GMV likely surged nearly 30%, driven by fashion growth and steady beauty segment gains. Acquired brands such as Dot & Key, along with in-house lines like Kay Beauty and Nykaa Cosmetics, continued to drive strong growth for the company's portfolio.

articles.title: Adapting Marketing Strategies in the AI Era: Beyond Virtual Assistant Roles to Become Content Creators This title emphasizes the need for marketers to evolve beyond traditional virtual assistant roles
articles.author: Omar El Sayed
articles.summary: Netflix uses AI algorithms to personalize content recommendations, enhancing user engagement. Coca-Cola employed AI to analyze and optimize ad variations, resulting in improved performance. HubSpot integrates AI into its marketing automation platform, providing personalized content recommendations and insights into customer behavior.

articles.title: 30 TikTok Products That Deliver Real Results
articles.author: Amber Usher
articles.summary: Miss Mouth's launched Messy Eater Stain Treater spray, a stain remover free of chlorine and sulfates. Gold Bond introduced firming neck and chest cream with salicylic acid, glycerin, and aloe. The Pink Stuff launched "Sqeezy" set, featuring their cleaning paste and a versatile sponge, and Olay launched Super Serum Body Wash, an extension of their TikTok-viral facial serum, designed to keep skin glowing and moisturized.

articles.title: Ninja Luxe Café is finally in Australia and coffee lovers are losing it over this 3-in-1 machine
articles.author: Ariana Pezeshki
articles.summary: Ninja has launched the Luxe Café in Australia, a 3-in-1 coffee machine offering espresso, cold brew, and filter coffee options. Available in multiple colors, it features a touchscreen, hands-free frothing, and a built-in grinder, and is priced at $999.99 at Myer and ninjakitchen.com.au.

articles.title: Nykaa shares in focus as Q2 GMV growth nears 30%, revenue rises mid-20s
articles.author: Amit Mudgill
articles.summary: Nykaa anticipates a strong Q2 FY2026, driven by growth in its Beauty and Fashion verticals. The Beauty segment expects mid-twenties growth, fueled by House of Nykaa brands, Dot & Key, Kay Beauty, and Nykaa Cosmetics. The Fashion segment expects higher mid-twenties NSV growth, boosted by brand assortment and customer acquisition.

articles.title: I tried this $30 multitool from Amazon, and it handled more than what the seller claimed
articles.author: ZDNet
articles.summary: NexTool S11 Pro provides a lightweight and dependable alternative to full-size multitools. It emphasizes portability.

articles.title: Kindle Scribe vs. ReMarkable Paper Pro: I compared both tablets, here's which is better
articles.author: ZDNet
articles.summary: Amazon's Kindle Scribe is a new product that appears impressive, prompting a comparison with Remarkable's Paper Pro.

articles.title: 51 Mundane Products That Are, To Put It Lightly, Life Changing
articles.author: Mallory Mower
articles.summary: Built introduces 'Puff Protein Bars', chocolate-covered marshmallows with 17 grams of protein. Windex launches an outdoor glass cleaner attachable to a hose for easy window cleaning. Monday Haircare releases Dry Shampoo with gardenia scent and keratin treatment. Medicube unveils 'Zero Pore' Pads, Korean skincare pads with lactic and salicylic acid. PanOxyl presents Antimicrobial Hydrating Acne Creamy Wash for sensitive skin. TBH introduces Tineco 2-in-1 cordless vacuum and mop. Rael launches "Miracle Invisible Spot Cover" Pimple Patches. Gold Bond releases firming neck and chest cream. Qualify introduces chocolate brownie protein powder.

articles.title: Yup, This Is Basically A List Of 33 Top-Tier Products
articles.author: Samantha Wieder
articles.summary: The article showcases a range of newly introduced products including an under-eye brightener with hyaluronic acid and shea butter, a stainless-steel water bottle with a double-spout and leak-proof design, and a mascara offering dramatic lashes for under $5. Other notable products include antimicrobial toothbrushes with "floss" bristles, a cleansing oil for makeup removal and acne reduction, and a callus-removal gel offering salon-quality results at home.

articles.title: OSS is Bringing the Power of the Data Center to the Fight at the 2025 ...
articles.author: Nasdaq Globe Newswire
articles.summary: A company is set to unveil its newly developed integrated technologies. These technologies incorporate powerful performance with low latency.

articles.title: Amazon's new colour Kindle just dropped to its lowest-ever price ahead of Prime Day 2025
articles.author: The Independent
articles.summary: Amazon is offering a £70 discount on the Kindle Colorsoft in anticipation of Amazon Prime Big Deal Days. This promotion may indicate a recent launch or focus on this product.

articles.title: Motorola Razr Ultra Is Our Favorite Flip Phone of 2025, and It's Now $300 Off ...
articles.author: CNET
articles.summary: Motorola Razr Ultra smartphone is available at a discounted price during Prime Day.

articles.title: Best Amazon Prime Day headphones deals October 2025: Save on Beats, AirPods, Sony, and more
articles.author: ZDNet
articles.summary: Amazon is launching deals on headphones and earbuds as part of its October Prime Day event, which starts tomorrow. These deals are already available.

articles.title: Galaxy Digital Introduces Innovative GalaxyOne Platform Offering Crypto, Stocks, and Attractive 8% Yields
articles.author: Crypto Economy
articles.summary: Galaxy Digital, led by Mike Novogratz, has launched GalaxyOne, a consumer-focused platform. GalaxyOne merges crypto trading, stock brokerage, and savings products, aiming to rival Robinhood and Kraken. The platform also offers Galaxy Premium Yield with 8% APY for accredited investors.

articles.title: New Aldi Food Market is Coming to Lower Ocean County
articles.author: Eddie Davis
articles.summary: Aldi is opening a new 19,631-square-foot store in Ocean County. The supermarket, approved by the Barnegat Township Planning Board on Sept. 30, will be located on Barnegat Blvd. Aldi carries mostly its own brands, offers healthier food options, and operates with a smaller store footprint.
